message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I appreciate your position, but I am still not able to meet at $13,000. Would you consider $12,500 for the product?
